Package com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CombiningAlgorithm<T extends Evaluatable>
    CombiningAlgorithm is the interface for objects that implement XACML combining algorithms for rules, policies, and policy sets.
    FunctionArgument
    FunctionArgument is the interface implemented by objects that can serve as arguments to a FunctionDefinition evaluate call.
    FunctionDefinition
    FunctionDefinition is the interface that objects representing XACML functions found in Match and Apply elements in Policies, PolicySets and Rules.
    PolicyFinder
    PolicyFinder is the interface for objects that can locate XACML Policies and PolicySets by identifier and contains the root Policy or Policy set.
    PolicyFinderResult<T extends PolicyDef>
    PolicyFinderResult is the interface for return values of the methods in the PolicyFinderFactory interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdviceExpression
    AdviceExpression extends PolicyComponent to implement the XACML AdviceExpression element.
    AllOf
    AnyOf extends PolicyComponent and implements the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.Matchable interface to represent XACML AllOf elements in a XACML Target.
    AnyOf
    AnyOf extends PolicyComponent and implements the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy.Matchable interface to represent XACML AnyOf elements in a XACML Target.
    AttributeAssignmentExpression
    AttributeAssignmentExpression extends PolicyComponent to represent a XACML AttributeAssignmentExpression element.
    AttributeAssignmentResult
    AttributeAssignmentResult is the object returned by the evaluate method of an AttributeAssignmentExpression.
    Bag
    Bag represents a collection of XACML attribute values for the same attribute.
    CombinerParameter
    CombinerParameter extends PolicyComponent to represent a XACML CombinerParameter element.
    CombiningAlgorithmFactory
    CombiningAlgorithmFactory is an abstract class for mapping function Identifier ids to CombiningAlgorithm objects.
    CombiningElement<T extends Evaluatable>
    CombiningElement wraps an com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.evl.Evaluatable with a set of TargetedCombinerParameters for use with a CombiningAlgorithm to get a combined EvaluationResult
    Condition
    Condition extends PolicyComponent to represent the XACML Condition element in a XACML Rule.
    Expression
    Expression extends PolicyComponent to represent a XACML ExpressionType element.
    ExpressionResult
    ExpressionResult is the object returned by the evaluate method of Expression objects.
    ExpressionResultBoolean
    ExpressionResultBoolean extends ExpressionResult to represent predicates.
    FunctionArgumentAttributeValue
    FunctionArgumentAttributeValue implements FunctionArgument for a single AttributeValue
    FunctionArgumentBag
    FunctionArgumentBag implements the FunctionArgument interface for a Bag objects.
    FunctionArgumentExpression
    FunctionArgumentExpression implements the FunctionArgument interface for unevaluated Expressions.
    FunctionDefinitionFactory
    FunctionDefinitionFactory is an abstract class for mapping function Identifier ids to FunctionDefinition objects.
    Match
    Match extends PolicyComponent and implements the Matchable interface to represent a XACML Match element.
    ObligationExpression
    ObligationExpression extends PolicyComponent to implement the XACML ObligationExpression element.
    Policy
    Policy extends PolicyDef to represent a XACML 3.0 Policy element.
    PolicyDef
    PolicyDef extends PolicySetChild with members and methods common to XACML 3.0 Policies and PolicySets.
    PolicyDefaults
    PolicyDefaults represents the default values associated with a XACML 3.0 Policy or PolicySet that may be overridden or inherited by child Policies or PolicySets.
    PolicyFinderFactory
    PolicyFinderFactory provides methods for loading XACML 3.0 policies and policy sets that are used by the com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.PDPEngine to evaluate requests.
    PolicyIdReference
    PolicyIdReference extends PolicyIdReferenceBase for Policy objects with an implementation of the ensureReferencee method to find a Policy.
    PolicyIdReferenceBase<T extends PolicyDef>
    PolicyIdReferenceBase extends PolicySetChild to implement a XACML PolicyIdReference element.
    PolicyIssuer
    PolicyIssuer extends PolicyComponent to represent the XACML 3.0 PolicyIssuer element in Policies and PolicySets.
    PolicySet
    PolicySet extends PolicyDef to represent a XACML PolicySet element.
    PolicySetChild
    PolicySetChild extends com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.PolicyComponent to represent XACML 3.0 Policies, PolicySets, PolicyReferences, and PolicySetReferences.
    PolicySetIdReference
    PolicySetIdReference extends PolicyIdReferenceBase for com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.PolicySet objects to implement the ensureReferencee method to find PolicySets.
    Rule
    Rule extends PolicyComponent to represent a XACML Rule within a Policy.
    Target
    Target extends PolicyComponent to implement XACML 3.0 Target elements for Policies, PolicySets, and Rules.
    TargetedCombinerParameter<T,U>
    TargetedCombinerParameter extends CombinerParameter to include a lazy reference to a particular sub-element within the evaluatable children that should be used when combining evaluation results from that sub-element.
    TargetedCombinerParameterMap<T,U>
    TargetedCombinerParameterMap is a utility for maintaining a collection of com.att.research.xacmlatt.policy.TargetedCombinerParameter objects with the mappings to their targets.
    VariableDefinition
    VariableDefinition extends PolicyComponent to represent a XACML VariableDefinition element.
    VariableMap
    VariableMap is a collection of VariableDefinitions that are accessible by the variable identifier.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RuleEffect
    RuleEffect is an enumeration of the XACML decision effects that a Rule may apply to.
